coreAtributes.name: Royal Horn Rings
coreAtributes.description: A ring that fits onto a person's horns. It is said to have been forged by devoted servants of the Liln to celebrate the divine corruption of the daughters of Lilith.

displacementText.playerSelf: You remove your royal horn rings.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You rip off [npc.name]'s royal horn rings.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] rips off your royal horn rings.

replacementText.playerSelf: You slide on the royal horn rings onto your horns.
replacementText.playerNPC: You slide on the royal horn rings on [npc.name]'s horns.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You forcefully slams the royal horn rings onto [npc.name]'s horns.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] slides the royal horn rings onto [npc.her] horns.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slides the royal horn rings onto your horns.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] forcefully slams the royal horn rings onto your horns.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc.Name] slides on the royal horn rings onto [npc2.name]'s horns.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] forcefully slams on the royal horn rings onto [npc2.name]'s horns.
